message.content: {"id": "10022", "title": "Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement", "description": "The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects \"Perform build automatically on resource modification\". This behavior is incorrect. ", "OB": "The \"Build\" action should not be enabled in the Java popup menus if the user has selected \"Perform build automatically on resource modification\" in the Preferences > Workbench settings. ", "EB": "There should be no need for a manual build if the automatic build option is selected. ", "SR": ""}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '10022', 'title': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement', 'description': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement ', 'OB': 'If "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspectiveis always enabled. Even if the user goes to PreferencesWorkbench andselects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" the build menuoption still appears in the Java popup menus.I believe this is incorrect. ', 'EB': 'No need for a manual build if the build is alreadydone, automatically.Mazen Faraj. ', 'SR': ''}
